c:attribute.name: id
c:attribute.description: Driver-owned globally unique identifier for the hub

c:attribute.name: account
c:attribute.description: Driver-owned account associated with the hub

c:attribute.name: place
c:attribute.description: Driver-owned place where the device is currently located

c:attribute.name: name
c:attribute.description: Human readable name for the hub

c:attribute.name: image
c:attribute.description: Media URL to image that represents the hub

c:attribute.name: registrationState
c:attribute.description: The registration state of the hub

c:attribute.name: time
c:attribute.description: The current time on the hub. Milliseconds since Jan 1, 1970 (UTC).

c:method.name: PairingRequest
c:method.description: Lists all devices associated with this account

c:parameter.name: actionType
c:parameter.description: Whether pairing should start or stop

c:parameter.name: timeout
c:parameter.description: The amount of time in milliseconds for which the place will be able to add devices

c:method.name: UnpairingRequest
c:method.description: Lists all devices associated with this account

c:parameter.name: actionType
c:parameter.description: Whether pairing should start or stop

c:parameter.name: timeout
c:parameter.description: The amount of time in milliseconds for which the place will be able to add devices.

c:parameter.name: protocol
c:parameter.description: The namespace of the protocol of the device expected to be removed. By default no device is expected to be removed.

c:parameter.name: protocolId
c:parameter.description: The protocolId of the device expected to be removed. By default no device is expected to be removed.

c:parameter.name: force
c:parameter.description: True if the expected device is to be forcefully unpaired. Defaults to false.

c:method.name: ListHubs
c:method.description: Lists all hubs associated with this account

c:return.name: hubs
c:return.description: The list of hubs associated with this account

c:method.name: ResetLogLevels
c:method.description: Resets all log levels to their normal values.

c:method.name: SetLogLevel
c:method.description: Sets the log level of for the specified scope, or the root log level if no scope is specified.

c:parameter.name: level
c:parameter.description: The log level to set the scope to use

c:parameter.name: scope
c:parameter.description: The logging scope affected by the log level, ROOT if none is specified.

c:method.name: GetLogs
c:method.description: Gets recent logs from the hub.

c:return.name: logs
c:return.description: Recent log statements from the hub, gzip compressed, and base 64 encoded.

c:method.name: StreamLogs
c:method.description: Starts streaming logs to the platform for the specified amount of time.

c:parameter.name: duration
c:parameter.description: The amount of time to stream logs in milliseconds.

c:parameter.name: severity
c:parameter.description: The log severity and higher that should be streamed.

c:method.name: GetConfig
c:method.description: Gets all key/value pairs describing the hub's configuration.

c:parameter.name: defaults
c:parameter.description: A flag indicating if default values should be reported.

c:parameter.name: matching
c:parameter.description: A regular expression used to select keys to include in the response.

c:return.name: config
c:return.description: Key/value pairs for the hub configuration.

c:method.name: SetConfig
c:method.description: Gets all key/value pairs describing the hub's configuration.

c:parameter.name: config
c:parameter.description: Key/value pairs to set in the hub configuration.

c:return.name: failed
c:return.description: Key/value that could not be set.

c:event.name: HubConnected
c:event.description: Sent when a hub comes online. This may be very specific to the given protocol and require client interpretation.

c:event.name: HubDisconnected
c:event.description: Sent when a hub goes offline. This may be very specific to the given protocol and require client interpretation.
